skillTree.name: Cauldron of Blood
skillTree.description: A gift from Khaine, containing the secret of eternal youth and beauty. His brides may bathe in it to renew their vitality.

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Bride of Khaine
skillTree.description: Deep devotion to the Bloody-handed God have led to his favour, enabling her to withstand more punishment in melee than others.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Cry of War
skillTree.description: By screeching one of the seventeen secret names of Khaine, the Death Hag freezes her enemies with horror.

skillTree.name: Rune of Khaine
skillTree.description: His gore-red rune blazes upon the Death Hag's brow, marking her as one of the Lord of Murder's chosen.

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Impassioned
skillTree.description: There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Soothsaying
skillTree.description: Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Augury
skillTree.description: An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

skillTree.name: Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Hag Queen
skillTree.description: Revel with your queen.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Witch Elves and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Scent of Slaughter
skillTree.description: Like bloodhounds to prey, all Witch Elves are drawn to battle.

skillTree.name: Offerings for the Shrine
skillTree.description: Hearts, entrails, and severed limbs.

skillTree.name: Bloody Concoction
skillTree.description: Laced with terrible, poisonous herbs.

skillTree.name: Promises of Bloodshed
skillTree.description: Khaine will be pleased.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Witch Elves and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Dripping Blades
skillTree.description: A single wound from a Witch Elf blade is a death sentence, or worse. It's no wonder their enemies are so hesitant to strike.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: -1 when defending 
	(enemy armies in region)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: -2 when defending 
	(enemy armies in region)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: -3 when defending 
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Blessed Murder
skillTree.description: The malice of the Lord of Murder is unbearable.

effects.description:
Armour: -1 when attacking
	(enemy armies in region)

Armour: -2 when attacking
	(enemy armies in region)

Armour: -4 when attacking
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Live to Slaughter Another Day
skillTree.description: Each blow turned aside, every Witch Elf that survives the battle, is yet more sacrifice brought to Khaine's altars.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Witch Elves and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Khaine's Mysteries
skillTree.description: The Hag guards many secrets; a scarce few she will share with her sisters.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +8% for Witch Elves and Sisters of Slaughter units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Vendor Contacts
skillTree.description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Cruel
backgroundSkills.description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Malevolent
backgroundSkills.description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.

backgroundSkills.name: Malicious
backgroundSkills.description: When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Construction cost: -25% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
	(local region)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags
	(own local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Vicious
backgroundSkills.description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Ambush Master
backgroundSkills.description: From shadows we came...

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Blood of Asur
backgroundSkills.description: They will pay for what should be ours!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves
	(all units in army)
Income from post-battle loot: +10% against High Elves

backgroundSkills.name: Harpies of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: Deadly and fast as northern wind.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Harpies units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Shadows of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: They don't need armour to kill their enemies. Bloody!

effects.description:
Armour: +2 for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders and Doomfire Warlock units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +2 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tyrant
backgroundSkills.description: They will tremble... You too, in time...

backgroundSkills.name: First Strike
backgroundSkills.description: For Khaine!
